intro: Orfilea neraudiana, commonly known as the black orfilea, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in dense forest undergrowth. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and conservation programs.
